details.details: Error: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='vimarsh-backend-app-flex-accch9cmbah2bzb0.westus2-01.azurewebsites.net', port=443): Read timed out. (read timeout=10)

recommendations: Verify backend deployment and URL configuration

Verify Azure App Registration is set to 'Multitenant'
Check Azure App Registration 'Allow public client flows' is enabled
